Injured on 9/21/1990 with a Pulled Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
10/10/1990: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $4,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1990...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/5/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
